p: Three days post-infection, viral RNA was extracted from infected cell supernatants. Reverse transcription specific for vRNAs and qPCRs were performed as described above. The qPCRs were performed with segment-specific primers using a LightCycler 480 (Roche) as described 19. The relative amounts of each vRNA were calculated using the 2 −ΔΔCt method with wild-type NA-NA- NA as virus reference and segment M as segment reference, except for segment M quantification where segment NP was used as segment reference.
